name: Maylo's journey
description:
Help Maylo stay up as long as possible and attend him on his way to his destiny.

Maylo's journey is a short game and it was made during the Ludum Dare 50 game jam. This was my first game jam, and my first game that I made in under 12 hours.

I hope you enjoy it!

W or ↑jump / double jumpA or  ←go rightS or  ↓go downD or →go leftSpaceParachute (if collected)

Music by David Fesliyan
